page.title: 05EDUCATION BLOCK 01160651
page.content: Portnahaven Primary School,Portnahaven Isle of Islay:Tel.no:-0496 86 237. Portnahaven School is the only school in our block.Although it is in{ {Strathclyde Region}it is administered at a local level by the{Dept. of {Education,Argyll and Bute Division, {Alexandra Parade,Dunoon. Portnahaven school is a small rural school with only 9 pupils and one teacher,Mrs. Violet Cusworth. Primary 1(5 year olds)....2boys,2girls Primary 2(6 year olds)....1boy Primary 3(7 year olds)....none Primary 4(8 year olds)....1girl Primary 5(9 year olds)....1girl Primary 6(10year olds)....none Primary 7(11year olds)....2girls The school was built in 1878 and has served the children of the area since that date.At the end of primary 7 they attend Islay High School-20 miles away
